cyberpunkred-armor-ablates-easier.settin: Enable or disable the Armor Ablates Easier house rule. Any time a hit is scored against an opponent, even if that attack doesn't pierce the armor, the armor still ablates by 1.
The SP value for which armor ignores this effect. For example: if this is set to 13, armor with remaining SP of 13 or higher will not be ablated under this rule.
